text: The 2001 Croatian Cup Final was a two-legged affair played between Hajduk Split and Dinamo Zagreb. The first leg was played in Split on 9 May 2001, while the second leg on 23 May 2001 in Zagreb. Dinamo Zagreb won the trophy with an aggregate result of 3–0. ==Road to the final== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=2|Hajduk Split !Round !colspan=2|Dinamo Zagreb
